ComicInfo.Summary:
Three scientific adventurers face strange creatures, lost civilizations, and supernatural threats... when they're not too busy being complete jerks to each other. PLUS! Follow the depressing misadventures of Snelson, an over-the-hill comedian who peaked in the 90s. EXTRA! Pics, prose, and possibly poems! Painted cover by Richard Williams (MAD, Edgar Allan Poe's Snifter of Terror).
Story TitlesHashtag: Danger (Mission 000009) The Name of the Game Is Death!, Part 1Part 2: The Tomb Be Their Destiny!Part 3: Flight From Terror!Part 4: Judgement in Cyber-Earth!Part 5: The Road Back!EpilogueSnelson: What's the Deal With Waiting In Line?Notes On the Successful Completion of A HomunculusChez SiriusNote: Missions 000001-000008 were published as back-up short stories in High Heaven #1-5 (1-5) and Captain Ginger #2-4 (6-8); both arcs are self-contained stories.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-30 11:46:40. [CVDB707585]
ComicInfo.Writer: Gunnar de Winter, Mark Russell, Paul Constant, Tom Peyer
ComicInfo.Penciller: Alan Robinson, Charlie Sam, Chris Giarrusso, Fred Harper
ComicInfo.Inker: Alan Robinson, Charlie Sam, Chris Giarrusso, Fred Harper
